monogr.title: “Written for Our Discipline and Use”: The Construction of Christian and Jewish Identities in Late Ancient Bible Interpretation

body.bibl: Bukovec, Predrag. “Auslegung in Abgrenzung: Antijüdische Bibelexegese Bei Aphrahat Dem Persischen Weisen.” In “Written for Our Discipline and Use”: The Construction of Christian and Jewish Identities in Late Ancient Bible Interpretation, edited by Agnethe Siquans, 89–108.
